text: Faten Hamama (, , 27 May 1931 â€“ 17 January 2015) was an Egyptian producer and actress of movie and television. She was known for her roles in The Blocked Road, Struggle in the Valley, Our Sweet Days, I don't Sleep, and Don't Turn off the Sun. Hamama died 17 on January 2015 following a short illness, aged 83. == Photos== == References == == Other websites == * Faten Hamama's official website * Category:1931 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Disease- related deaths in Egypt Category:Egyptian movie actors Category:Egyptian television actors Category:Movie producers
